name: Stephen Hawking
description:
In this short story you follow the life of Stephen Hawking and his battle with ALS a form of Motor Neurone Disease. In this game you take on the character of Stephen Hawking and learn about MND and ALS along the way.

This was a school project  so if the game doesn't seem too fun its because its "educational"

Controls: 

WASD/ArrowKeys - Movement 

J/Z - A key 

K/X - B key 

ENTER - start 

SHIFT - select

SOURCES:

https://www.mndnsw.asn.au/about-mnd/what-is-mnd.html

https://www.ninds.nih.gov/Disorders/Patient-Caregiver-Education/Fact-Sheets/Amyotrophic-Lateral-Sclerosis-ALS-Fact-Sheet

https://www.biography.com/scientist/stephen-hawking

http://www.hawking.org.uk/
